name: My Last Sandwich
description:
One day, a person named Savvo is gonna eat his sandwich. However, a dragon stole his sandwich. He has to chase the dragon and get his sandwich back while he has to face a lot of obstacles in the way.

Features

  • Original pixel graphics
  • 5+ events
  • 5+ bad ends
  • Narrative events
  • Narrative bad ends
  • Trap choices
  • Humor events
  • Unexpected events
  • Sequence of pages to simulate animation
  • Sandwich and dragon

How to play

  • Choose a correct choice to proceed
  • Wrong choice may lead to bad end

Requirement

  • A PDF reader (Recommended: Foxit Reader)

Changelog

  • v1.0.2 (April 15th, 2016, GMT)
    • Added special page just in case if hyperlink goes to wrong page.
    • Changed some links.
    • Added more info for document properties.
    • Replaced name since I used different one before.
    • Changed version position.
    • Added a page on prologue to strengthen the stealing impact.
    • Changed title logo.
  • v1.0.1 (March 6th, 2015, GMT)
    • Fixed stacking hyperlink bugs (which affects only when playing in browser) when clicking the retry button.
    • Fixed stacking hyperlink bugs (which affects only when playing in browser) in forest's Next button
    • Revised the contest link in the credit (from the contest website into the entry's contest website)
  • v1 (June 30th, 2014, GMT)
    • Game is released.
